solution.explanation: This lab contains a SQL injection vulnerability in the login form. The application doesn't properly sanitize user input, allowing attackers to manipulate SQL queries.
steps: Observe the username and password fields
Enter ' OR '1'='1 in the username field
Enter anything in the password field
Submit the form to bypass authentication
The flag will be displayed on the admin dashboard
hints: SQL comments use -- to ignore the rest of the query
Try to make the WHERE clause always evaluate to true
